name: Keebgram
description: Keebgram is a passion-driven final school project designed to revolutionize the keyboard enthusiast community. It offers a dynamic platform where users can unleash their creativity by designing custom keycap sets for their keyboards while connecting with fellow enthusiasts.
description2: With social media aspects including posts and comments, and a powerful custom keyboard editor, Keebgram is more than just a toolâ€”it's a vibrant community hub for those who love all things keyboards.

name: Andie
description: Andie is a start up company that found success during 2020 from their live information tracking application to monitor wait times into public places such as groceries store.
description2: The Andie Corporate Guest Experience is a bidding platform that provides restaurants with unique opportunities. No matter the size, restaurants can find and submit bids for big-ticket catering and dining experiences that bring significant traffic and revenue.
